      Returns:

    • setOtherPlayers

      public void setOtherPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pl)
      Saves the names of the other players in the match as a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      pl - ArrayList of strings representing the names of the players.

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlayers()
      Returns list of the other players. Used by JavaFX class to display names on the GUI.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings representing the names of the players.

    • getPlayersNum

      public int getPlayersNum()
      Returns number of players in the match.
      Returns:
      int representing the number of players in the match.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the player using this client.
      Returns:
      String containing the name of the player using this client.

    • getInit

      public char getInit()
      Returns a character representing the player in the match. Should be unique.
      Returns:
      Character of the player using this client.

    • getGods

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getGods()
      Returns list of gods selected by the player using this client.
      Returns:
      List of gods selected by the player using this client.

    • updateBoardView

      public void updateBoardView​(BoardView bv)
      Receives the BoardView containing the current situation of the board and updates it, displaying it in the GUI.
      Specified by:
      updateBoardView in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      bv - BoardView containing a representation of the board.

    • getPlayerInfo

      public void getPlayerInfo()
      Server type function, asks the client to answer with the name. In the GUI it starts the scene containing the login page(LoginUI).

    • sendPlayerInfo

      public void sendPlayerInfo​(java.lang.String name, int playerNum)
      Sends the information asked with "getPlayerInfo()" to server. Called by LoginUI.class.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player using this client.
      playerNum - Preferred number of players selected by the player using this client.

    • getPlayerGod

      public void getPlayerGod​(char initial, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> options, int nPicks)
      Server type function, asks the client to answer with the god. In the GUI it starts the scene containing the god selection page(GodSelectionUI).
      Specified by:
      getPlayerGod in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      initial - Character unique for the player using this client (assigned by server).
      options - List of gods that the player can select.

    • sendGods

      public void sendGods​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> gods, boolean first)
      Sends the information asked with "getPlayerGod(...)" to server. Called by GodSelectionUI.class.
      Parameters:
      gods - List of gods selected by the player (can be 1 or more).
      first - True if the god selection UI has already been called

    • getWorkerPlacement

      public void getWorkerPlacement​(int[][] workers, char initial)
      Server type function, asks the client to answer with the position of 1 tile on the board to place a worker. In the GUI it starts the scene containing the game page(GameUI).
      Specified by:
      getWorkerPlacement in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      workers - Matrix containing the tiles already occupied by other workers.
      initial - Character unique for the player using this client (check).

    • sendWorkerPlacement

      public void sendWorkerPlacement​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tiles)
      Sends the information asked with "getWorkerPlacement(...)" to server. Called by GameUI.class.
      Parameters:
      tiles - List containing the coordinates of the selected tile (position of the worker).

    • getSelectedWorker

      public void getSelectedWorker​(OptionSelection opt, boolean canPass)
      Server type function, if opt.size() = 2 it asks the client to answer with the position of 1 worker on the board to move. If opt.size() = 1 it asks the client to answer with the tile where the player wants to build.
      Specified by:
      getSelectedWorker in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      opt - Possible workers the player can select.
      canPass - Boolean, true if the player can skip this phase.

    • sendPower

      public void sendPower​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> pow)
      Sends the information asked with "getSelectedWorker(...)" to server. Called by GameUI.class.
      Parameters:
      pow - Coordinates of the selected tile/worker, based on information contained in getSelectedWorker(...).

    • sendPass

      public void sendPass()
      Signals to the server that the player wants to skip this phase.

    • getWorkerSelection

      public void getWorkerSelection​(OptionSelection opt, boolean canPass)
      Specified by:
      getWorkerSelection in class ClientView

    • displayGameEnd

      public void displayGameEnd​(char winnerInit)
      Displays final message based on who won.
      Specified by:
      displayGameEnd in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      winnerInit - Character of the player that won the match.

    • waitingOpponent

      public void waitingOpponent​(char playerInit)
      Specified by:
      waitingOpponent in class ClientView

    • lobbyAndNameSelection

      public void lobbyAndNameSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<LobbyView> lobbies, int error)
      Server type function, sends information about current active matches. In the GUI it starts the scene containing the lobby selection page(LobbyUI).
      Specified by:
      lobbyAndNameSelection in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      lobbies - Information about every active match hosted by the server.
      error - Status flag, used to notify that there is no match available.

    • sendLobbySelection

      public void sendLobbySelection​(int number, boolean isJoining, int plNum)
      Sends the information asked with "lobbyAndNameSelection(...)" to server. Called by LobbyUI.class.
      Parameters:
      number - Room number selected.
      isJoining - True if the player is joining a match or creating one.
      plNum - Selected number of players, "-1" if the player is joining.

    • replay

      public void replay()
      Restarts the process of connection and login (unused)

    • displayLostConnection

      public void displayLostConnection()
      Notifies to the player that the connection to the server has been lost
      Specified by:
      displayLostConnection in class ClientView
